text: Se'idina tini tomadera samabeta karabena jamayet karara dinera jan'ye -- e'iti'i moha-apasaranera dina. Ara ye ke'u allahâ€Œte bisbasa kare ebam satkarma sampadana kare, tini tara theke tara saba papa mocana kare debena ebam take prabesa karabena sbargo'udyanasamuhe yadera nice diye baye caleche jharanaraji, sekhane tara abasthana karabe cirakala. E'iti eka birata saphalya.
